title: Bootstrap Scrollspy
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Tracking Location
Scrollspy automatically updates navigation targets based on scroll position to indicate which link is currently active in the viewport.

### Usage
1. Add `data-bs-spy="scroll"` to the **content container** (usually `<body>` or a scrolling div).
2. Add `data-bs-target="#navId"` to point to the navigation menu.
3. Ensure links in nav allow anchors (`#sec1`) matching IDs in content (`id="sec1"`).
